ygData.subject: The IRC Channel, and group movement
ygData.msgSnippet: I am available to host a website/forum, or whatever needs you might want. I am also STILL running the IRC channel, which has had a max of 3 people in there,

I am available to host a website/forum, or whatever needs you might 
want.

I am also STILL running the IRC channel, which has had a max of 3 
people in there, besides me. Now there are nobody. If there is still 
interest in such matters, then I'll keep it open. If not, please let 
me know.

Server: irc.gamesnet.net
Channel: #openglad
Get mIRC (light IRC chat client) here: http://www.mirc.com

If you have mIRC, copy/paste this link into your browser: 
irc://irc.gamesnet.net/openglad
